select WorkInstructionProcedureID, WorkInstructionProcedure, WorkInstructionRef, PartID, IsEdited, FromDT, ToDT, RevisionNo, LoginID, ModifiedDT, 1 as 'modcoID' from MES.WorkInstructionProcedure
